ctu_text: 1. **Stability in Lives:** The objective of the scheme is to create stability in the lives of educated unemployed youth by ensuring they have a regular income to meet their basic needs. 1. **Inclusive Approach:** The scheme also caters to the needs of physically challenged individuals by offering a higher amount of assistance, recognizing their additional challenges in securing employment.
image_prompt: Flat-icon infographic, pastel palette – 1. **Stability in Lives:** The objective of the scheme is to create stability in the lives of educated unemployed youth
caption: Poster 1/5 – Benefits (numbers verified)

ctu_text:
The Selection and Rejection of the applications will be decided within 45 days. 
 1. Further action on the application will be intimated to the applicants through SMS.

ctu_text: The Application Form and all the attached documents will have to be submitted to the District/ Sub-Employment Exchange Office. \n 1. Scrutiny of the application will be done by the Employment Exchange Office. \n 1.
